main event: A witness observed an unidentified flying object in the sky over Danvers, Massachusetts on June 27, 1960.
interesting points: The object appeared to move in a zig-zag manner before disappearing at a high rate of speed., The witness described the object as having a metallic surface and emitting a bright bluish-white light surrounded by a halo of red-orange light., The object was said to have a size equivalent to a silver dollar at arm's length., The sighting lasted for about 2 to 3 minutes, with repeated appearances and disappearances behind trees., The witness was a reserve officer in the U.S. Air Force and considered his report credible.
witness description: The witness is a reserve officer in the U.S. Air Force with a lifelong interest in aviation.
